HIGHLAND

The high-level streams library for Node.js and the browser.

$ npm install highland

Download Source code

Introduction

Re-thinking the JavaScript utility belt, Highland manages synchronous and asynchronous code easily, using nothing more than standard JavaScript and Node-like Streams. You may be familiar with Promises, EventEmitters and callbacks but moving between them is far from seamless. Thankfully, there is a deeper abstraction which can free our code. By updating the tools we use on Arrays, and applying them to values distributed in time instead of space, we can discard plumbing and focus on the important things. By supporting back-pressure and laziness, Highland is able to describe whole programs including async control flow and exception handling. Time to dive in!
